ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: I don't often think about my thoughts. (Reverse scored)
Notes: 1= Strongly Agree; 2= Agree; 3= Slightly Agree; 4= Slightly Disagree; 5= Disagree; 6= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I am not really interested in analyzing my behavior. (Reverse scored)
Notes: 1= Strongly Agree; 2= Agree; 3= Slightly Agree; 4= Slightly Disagree; 5= Disagree; 6= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I am usually aware of my thoughts.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I'm often confused about the way that I really feel about things. (Reverse scored)
Notes: 1= Strongly Agree; 2= Agree; 3= Slightly Agree; 4= Slightly Disagree; 5= Disagree; 6= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: It is important for me to evaluate the things that I do.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I usually have a very clear idea about why I've behaved in a certain way.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I am very interested in examining what I think about.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I rarely spend time in self-reflection. (Reverse scored)
Notes: 1= Strongly Agree; 2= Agree; 3= Slightly Agree; 4= Slightly Disagree; 5= Disagree; 6= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I'm often aware that I'm having a feeling, but I often don't quite know what it is. (Reverse scored)
Notes: 1= Strongly Agree; 2= Agree; 3= Slightly Agree; 4= Slightly Disagree; 5= Disagree; 6= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I frequently examine my feelings.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: My behaviour often puzzles me. (Reverse scored)
Notes: 1= Strongly Agree; 2= Agree; 3= Slightly Agree; 4= Slightly Disagree; 5= Disagree; 6= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: It is important to me to try to understand what my feelings mean.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I don't really think about why I behave in the way that I do. (Reverse scored)
Notes: 1= Strongly Agree; 2= Agree; 3= Slightly Agree; 4= Slightly Disagree; 5= Disagree; 6= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: Thinking about my thoughts makes me more confused. (Reverse scored)
Notes: 1= Strongly Agree; 2= Agree; 3= Slightly Agree; 4= Slightly Disagree; 5= Disagree; 6= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I have a definite need to understand the way that my mind works.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I frequently take time to reflect on my thoughts.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Often I find it difficult to make sense of the way I feel about things. (Reverse scored)
Notes: 1= Strongly Agree; 2= Agree; 3= Slightly Agree; 4= Slightly Disagree; 5= Disagree; 6= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: It is important to me to be able to understand how my thoughts arise.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I often think about the way I feel about things.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I usually know why I feel the way I do.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: SRIS - Engagement in Self-Reflection subscore
Notes: Sum of items sris_1, 8, 10, 13, 16, 19

ElementDescription: SRIS - Need for Self-Reflection subscore
Notes: Sum of items sris_2, 5, 7, 12, 15, 18

ElementDescription: SRIS - Insight subscore
Notes: Sum of items sris_3, 4, 6, 9, 11, 14, 17, 20
